sentences.en: Avoid: Regret to loiter, bewilder to busy unpromising.
sentences.cn: 自我避免: 因虚度年华而悔恨, 因碌碌无为而迷茫!

sentences.en: I'm just not satisfied with his unpromising manner.
sentences.cn: 我就看不上他那个没出息的样子!

sentences.en: In fact, his business career had distinctly unpromising beginnings.
sentences.cn: 事实上，他的经商生涯从初期就明显前景暗淡。

sentences.en: Sydney Carton , idlest and most unpromising of men, was Stryver's great ally.
sentences.cn: 西得尼·卡尔登,最懒散和最无望的人, 是史曲勒孚的大盟友.

sentences.en: You always say that girls grow up definitely unpromising.
sentences.cn: 您经常说女孩长大肯定没出息.

trans.tran_cn: 无前途的，没有希望的，不堪造就，前途无望
trans.tran_en: If you describe something as unpromising, you think that it is unlikely to be successful or produce anything good in the future
